reviews.comments: Buen espacio.

La casa estaba impecable: limpia y cuidada, y muy cómoda. Hernán y Charlotte fueron muy amables con nosotras: simpáticos y atentos, nos dieron recomendaciones y nos ayudaron cuando lo necesitamos. Súper recomendable!
El departamento es muy prolijo, limpio y su ubicación es excelente. Tiene todo lo que podes necesitar y Charlotte y Hernan están atentos por cualquier detalle. Lo recomendaremos

Estuvimos cómodas calentitas y muy buena la ubicación del Depto 
Recomendable para estar a mano del centro y hacer las excursiones cómodamente La zona es mejor que la zona más alta de la cuidad Volveríamos sin ningún duda

La casa de Charlotte & Hernán es un muy buen hospedaje en El Calafate. Si el plan es ir de paseo, estar cerca del centro y tener la posibilidad de cocinarse uno mismo, recomiendo ampliamente esta opción. La casa tiene todo lo necesario para cocinar, incluye toallas y hasta cuenta con lavarropas. Su ubicación es muy buena; cerca de supermercados y de fácil acceso desde la terminal de micros. Con la belleza de El Calafate y las excursiones que hicimos no sentimos falta de la vista al lago. Desde un comienzo, el contacto con Hernán y Charlotte fue muy bueno. Nos dieron un dato genial para llegar desde el aeropuerto en transfer. Además, Hernán fue super amable al recibirnos y nos dio las indicaciones necesarias para manejarnos en la casa y en la ciudad.

La pasamos muy bien. Hernan muy atento en todo momento. El depto es amplio y tiene todas las comodidades, el baño es enorme. Esta pegado a una remiseria que es algo positivo. Un lugar para recomendar sin duda.

El departamento es igual a las fotos publicadas, muy amplio, cómodo y esta bien calefaccionado. Se encuentra muy bien ubicado a pocas cuadras del centro, plaza de juegos y tiendas. 
Los anfitriones fueron muy amables al recibirnos y nos respondieron todas las dudas que teniamos.

La casa es muy cómoda y tiene varias ventajas: es luminosa, esta bien calefaccionada, es independiente. 
Está en una zona muy tranquila a dos cuadras del centro. Hay varios negocios cerca para comprar comestibles, al lado hay una remisería (taxi).
Hernán fue realmente atento y sobre todo muy flexible con los horarios de entrada y salida. Dejó que nos quedaramos un rato más, hasta el horario de nuestro vuelo. Por eso estamos muy agradecidos!!!

A pesar de haber permanecido solo una noche, la casa tiene comodidades para una estancia larga. El lavarropas es un plus fundamental! 
Los anfitriones son muy atentos, y el lugar sumamente agradable y acogedor!
Muchisimas gracias Charlotte & Hernan! Volveremos!
La casa es muy cómoda
Exteriormente no dice nada el foro pero adentro es cómodo y agradable.

Todo estuvo excelente. El departamento es amplio, cómodo y muy bien ubicado. Desde un comienzo tanto Hernan como Charlotte se esforaron para ayudarnos en nuestra estadia en El Calafate, dandonos buenos consejos sobre donde comer y qué lugares visitar.

Volveremos la próxima vez que estemos en El Calafate
Tuvimos una estadía muy agradable el departamento es tal cual como se lo describe con una excelente ubicación, cómodo y espacioso. Muchas gracias Charlotte y Hernan!

Llegamos muy tarde a calafate y enseguida conseguimos alojamiento con charlotte&hernán. La casa es espaciosa y muy céntrica. Tiene todo lo necesario para una gran estadía en la ciudad. Más que recomendable!

Mi primera experiencia con Airbnb y es un 10. El departamento es tal cual las fotos, bien ubicado para acceder a todos los lugares a pie y muy cómodo para descansar después de un día de paseo. Los anfitriones muy atentos desde el primer momento. Muchas gracias.
Genial!! Muy recomendable
Nos vamos muy contentos!!! Lindo lugar, completo, buena ubicación. Hermoso!! Esperamos volver!!
Muy comodo, buena ubicación y acogedor. Huespedes super atentos y tienen muy buena comunicacion!

La casa es cómoda, las camas son muy confortables para descansar después de un día de mucha actividad al aire libre, el baño es amplio. Está cerca, para ir a pie,  de tiendas, supermercado, alquiler de autos, restaurantes... Charlotte y Hernán nos recibieron muy bien.

Charlotte y Hernan fueron excelentes anfitriones, siempre dispuestos para evacuar nuestras consultas antes del viaje como asi tambien pendientes todo el tiempo a nuestro arribo y durante la estadia.  
La casa es como se muestra en la fotografias, posee todo lo necesario, se encuentra bien ubicada, cerca del centro comercial y tiene un supermercado a 2 cuadras que cierra a las 12 de la noche y la calle se encuentra bien iluminada.
Sin dudas recomendaria esta casa!!!! Gracias Chalotte y Hernan, espero verlos nuevamente.
Charlotte y Hernán fueron muy amables! la casa muy linda y con buena ubicación
Hernán fue muy amable y atento desde el primer momento. Todas las recomendaciones que nos dió sobre la ciudad fueron muy acertadas!

Hemos pasado, con mi novia, unos hermosos días en El Calafate.
Charlotte & Hernán nos recibieron juntos a nuestra llegada, aun sabiendo que nuestro vuelo llegaba demorado por problemas climáticos. Son ambos sumamente atentos y agradables.
Tuvimos una charla de bienvenida, que se extendió casi hora y media, donde nos dieron un montón de tips y consejos útiles, para caminatas, paseos, excursiones, lugares de compra y gastronomía. 
Nos mostraron el apto., y tal cual lo muestran las fotos, es muy bonito, acogedor  y esta super equipado.
La calefacción y el agua caliente satisfacen por exceso; así que el frío no será una excusa para conocer esta linda ciudad :)
La ubicación es muy buena !!!, a una cuadra y un poquito más de la calle principal donde se desenvuelve la mayor actividad comercial.
Para llegar a los negocios mas pintorescos cuenten unas dos cuadras más. De todas formas caminar con ese marco de fondo es un placer, para un lado la montaña y para el otro el lago.
Para los que no pueden despegarse de la tecnología... el WiFi que brindan C&H es impecable, asi que, otro punto a favor !!!
Cabe señalar, que con gentileza y como no tenían reservas para ese día, nos permitieron realizar un "late check-out" (nos quedamos unas horas más) para pode aprovechar el día de vuelta ya que nuestro vuelo salía por la tarde.
Resumiendo, fue una estadía impecable y recomendable, para dedicarle unos días a esta hermosa ciudad de nuestra Patagonia.
Muchas gracias Charlotte & Hernán !!!!

Excelente experiencia. Grandes personas. Muy amables y cálidos. El lugar es exactamente como se ve en la foto. La calefacción funciona de 10 y jamás se pasa frío. Ubicación inmejorable, cerca del centro y de lugares de interés. 100% recomendable.
Todo muy bien y confortable,buena predispocision por parte de los dueños.Recomendables! Muchas gracias!

Charlotte y Hernán fueron excelentes anfitriones, disponibles cada vez que lo necesitamos.
Recibimos el depto en perfecto estado de limpieza y climatizado, con todos los elementos necesarios para nuestra estadía, incluso lavarropas que fue fundamental para ir lavando las 6 capas de ropa que usábamos diariamente.
La ubicación es ideal, cerca del centro, al lado de una remisería con buen precio para volver al aeropuerto, supermercado a 2 cuadras y una panadería increíble a 1 cuadra.
Maravillosa primera experiencia contratando por airbnb.

Sinceramente queremos agradecer a Charlotte y Hernán porque nos hicieron sentir como en casa. Son excelentes anfitriones.
No lleve secador de pelo y me prestaron uno, no teníamos guantes para hacer una excursión en la que estos eran requisito y ellos nos prestaron los suyos. 
También cuando llegamos nos orientaron e informaron sobre que hacer, donde comprar, etc.
Unos genios. De volver a Calafate, nos alojaremos con ellos.

Tanto Charlotte como Hernan desde la reserva a traves de Airbnb fueron sumamente amables y nos guiaron con mucha precisión acerca de como organizar nuestros dias en el Calafate. 
Al momento de arribar al alojamiento nos recibieron, nos mostraron la casa y todo estaba tal cual prometian las fotos y la descripcion que figuraba en esta pagina. Por otro lado dedicaron unos cuantos minutos a explicarnos aun mas en detalles las posibilidades turisticas de la zona, haciendonos mas comodas aun la toma de decisiones que nos quedaban pendientes. 
La casa estaba equipada con todo lo necesario, ubicada a 2 cuadras de donde comienza el centro y la zona comercial. 
El baño era muy comodo y las camas con muy buenos colchones.
Ha sido una muy buena eleccion de nuestra parte...RECOMENDAMOS ESTE LUGAR PORQUE SE VAN A SENTIR MUY COMODOS 
Gracias Hernan y Charlotte

La experiencia en el departamento de Charlotte y Hernan fue excelente. El departamento es exactamente lo que prometen las imágenes, cálido y acogedor, amplio y muy bien equipado con todo lo que se necesita para vivir allí una semana. Está muy cerca del centro y justo al lado de donde viven sus anfitriones, que son muy amables y predispuestos y nos ofrecieron consejo sobre excursiones y donde comer desde el día 1, además de facilitarnos su garaje para guardar nuestro auto de alquiler. 
Fue una estadía excelente y esperamos poder volver algún día.

El lugar es exactamente a lo descrito en el anuncio. Muy cómodo, nos sentimos como en casa. La ubicación es excelente, cerca de todo (centro comercial, super, kiosco, restaurante, bancos, etc.). La cocina completa para los que nos gusta la comida casera. El agua de la ducha sale bien caliente (fundamental para el clima del lugar) y la casa está muy bien calefaccionada. 
Los anfitriones muy amables y atentos. Respondieron a nuestras solicitudes muy rápido. 
Ha sido una experiencia muy agradable. Volveremos!
Muy amables y atentos, siempre preguntaban si necesitábamos algo. El departamento está muy cerca del centro y de la terminal, llegamos caminando desde ahí.

Esta pareja tan dulce, serviciales y atentos son total garantía de que tu estadía en el Calafate supera tus espectativas.

Ellos logran que quieras regresar pronto!
El apartamento tan acogedor, limpio y cómodo que no queda la menor duda de que son la decisión correcta. :)

Hernán nos recibió el día que llegamos con gran amabilidad! Nos dio muchas recomendaciones de tour por hacer y valieron la pena. 

La ubicación del apartamento es excelente, a unos 10 minutos caminando del centro y realmente fácil de llegar! Cerca hay un supermercado, más barato que los que se encuentran en la avenida principal, muy buena opción. 

Muchas gracias por la atención, fue excelente!!
Nuestra estadía fue muy agradable. El apartamento estaba equipado con todo el necesario y los dueños fueron muy amables.
Excelente sitio, accesible a todos los restaurantes y tiendas. Charlotte y Hernán son excelentes anfitriones. Si van a Calafate no duden en quedarse aquí.
Un lugar muy bonito, son personas muy amables, si lo recomiendo!
Excelentes anfitriones, muy amables y cordiales.

Charlotte y Hernán son anfitriones encantadores. Siempre a disposición. El apartamento está bien ubicado, a 10 min caminando desde el terminal de autobuses y centro de la ciudad. El apartamento es muy bueno y corresponde absolutamente a las fotos. Lo voy a aconsejar a mis amigos sin ninguna duda. Muchísimas gracias Charlotte y Hernán por todo su apoyo¡
Espacio buen ubicado cerca de la zona centro. Recomendable ampliamente
Hernán, como toda la gente de Calafate, te hacen la estancia muy agradable! El apartamento está muy bien ubicado. Lo recomendamos!
El departamento tiene todas las comodidades y es cerca del centro. Fuimos bien acogidos por Charlotte y su marido! muchas gracias por sus consejos.

Estuvimos con mi familia 4 días y pasamos excelente. El lugar está muy bien ubicado, cerca del centro y en un lugar muy tranquilo. La casa es tal como se ve en las fotos, muy cómoda y práctica para 4 personas. La calefacción y el agua caliente funcionan muy bien. Los anfitriones fueron muy atentos y resolvieron todos nuestros problemas de manera muy satisfactoria. Recomendamos ampliamente este alojamiento.
I totally recommend this place. Hosts are gems, super helpful before during and after. The place is adorable and stocked. Really comfy bed in the main room. Don't hesiste--book it if it's free!

Perfect little apartment with everything you could need. The hosts were were friendly and helpful. They made sure they were there to greet us and were very happy to give advice about tours and restaurants. Good location, short walk to centre of town and close to a market. I would happily recommend their apartment!

This is a great option for staying in El Calafate. Perhaps the location is the best thing about it, as it is close to the grocery store, bakeries, shops, and restaurants. The hosts were great as they gave us some recommendations when we first checked in. The place was clean and provides all the essentials necessary... clean towels, hot shower, heating, etc. This is an ideal place for a couple or a couple with a kid or 2.
You couldn't ask more from an Airbnb listing. Super friendly and welcoming host along with a sparkling clean apartment that's central to everything. Would definitely stay here again!

We arrived late and Charlotte & Hernan was kind enough to accommodate that.
Place was near to the main Street, clean and well equipped. We enjoyed our stay
One of our favorite places we stayed in all of Argentina. Great hosts, fantastic home with everything you would need. Walkable to everything.

A localização é excelente, perto do centro para ir a pé, num lugar tranquilo, seguro e silencioso. 
O local é bastante limpo, organizado e tudo pensado com muito capricho. 
A grande surpresa positiva é que os anfitriões têm uma horta em casa e oferecem aos hóspedes colher algumas hortaliças disponíveis na época!
Recomendo e nas próximas vezes voltarei a me hospedar com certeza!

Apartamento bem localizado, próximo à rua principal e a supermercados e padarias. Espaçoso e bem decorado, o apartamento conta com uma cozinha equipada para preparar e saborear uma boa refeição (o supermercado próximo tem um açougue excelente, vale pedir uns bifes de chorizo). O banheiro e o quarto, assim como a cozinha/sala tem um bom espaço para colocar suas coisas e a mala. E também, lavar as roupas foi mais uma vantagem de se hospedar neste apto. Tudo ótimo!

Really enjoyed my one night stay in Charlotte & Hernan’s wonderful apartment. Clean and modern, comfortable, with all amenities. Quick walk to shops and food. Thank you, Charlotte, for prompt communication and info at greeting. Only wish my stay was longer!

We had an amazing stay at Charlotte & Hernán. They welcomed us with a broad smile, showing us around in the house. There is a private parking, a washing machine, a well equiped kitchen, and a BEAUTIFUL bathroom. Everything was so clean, and the house is at approx. 1km from the city center; just a short walk or an even shorter car drive! Perfect stay. We felt like home, thank you C&H!
A lovely apartment in the heart and hustle of El Calafte. Hernan was very helpful and the apartment clean and cozy. Would highly recommend !

We stayed three nights at Nau B&B. Locationwise it's great, you've got everything close to the flat. If you need suggestions where to eat just ask away.
Hernán and Charlotte are very friendly.
Charlotte and Hernan were greats hosts, the place was also clean and the location was more than perfect. Highly recommended.
Charlotte and Hernán’s place was great! The apartment is lovely and easily walkable to restaurants and the main street, and they gave us great recommendations for meals while we were there.
Great place to stay while in El Calafate.  Charlotte & Hernán were very responsive and greeted us upon revival. We really enjoyed our stay and hope to come back again!
The apartment was very nice and Charlotte was EXTREMELY helpful in getting us acclimated to El Calafate. Definitely recommended!
Great location, clean and comfortable stay.

The apartment is less than 10 minutes walk to the main area of town and there is a supermarket 2 blocks away . The apartment is spacious and comfortable, the hot water system is tricky but works great once you figure it out.
Nice place with a great price. Highly recommend.
Charlotte and Hernán were very accommodating hosts. Their local tips and cute space made for a great night stay.

A simple place but clean and very well located. Owners very friendly and willing to help by any time.

Well recommended.

Dilcélio and Rafaela

Charlotte and Hernán were the perfect hosts. Super responsive and always helpful no matter what. 

The location was close to bars, restaurants, and a grocery store. And there’s a taxi company next door that can arrange a return trip to the airport. 

Would definitely recommend this place!
Great spot pretty central to the main tourist part of Calafate with fantastic hospitality and space, especially on a budget.

Every stay is an amazing stay at Nau B&B! Everything worked as expected and we were happy to be so close to the Centro. A warm shower and ability to make a home cooked meal were much appreciated after a day at Glacier National Park. C&H were amazingly kind and flexible throughout the preparation and checkin process. The taxi service next door was a great additional service as well. We highly recommend you stay here!
Quaint, cute place that’s close to the downtown area. Excellent and gracious hosts. We loved it.

We stayed at Charlotte & Hernan's place for 4 nights and were very pleased with the accommodations.  The place was clean and cozy and in a perfect location.  In addition, Charlotte and Hernan were super helpful in giving us a lot of tips on how to make the most out of our trip with great suggestions from the very start.  They were very prompt in communication and overall, we were very happy with our stay.

Charlotte & Hernan were incredibly kind, helpful and full of great local suggestions. Our stay was short but the place is cozy, very well located and all around great. Would most certainly stay again!
Great location. Really easy on arrival. Lovely hosts.

Great place to stay in El Calafate! Charlotte and Hernán were extremely nice and helpful hosts. The airbnb's location is great as it feels like you're on the main commercial street (Av. Libertador) but then again, it's not exactly on it so you still get some quietness. It's also well-equipped with everything you'd need when you travel (kitchen utensils, washing machine).

Absolutely wonderful hosts (with perfect English)! They gave great recommendations about tours, and were very responsive (within minutes) when I asked any questions. It's great they live right next door because they can assist with any issues that arise. They were also very helpful when describing transportation options from the airport to the apartment. Highly recommend!
Lovely place and great overall experience! Hernán and Charlotte were very helpful in giving us advice about renting a car in El Calafate and recommending activities.

Bien situé près du centre actif de El Calafate, l'appartement est spacieux, agréable et bien équipé. Charlotte et Hernan sont très accueillants et près à vous aider pour tout. Disposer d'un véhicule de location dans cette zone pour naviguer de Puerto Natales a El Chalten en passant par El Calafate est un plus non négligeable.
Amazing stay, although it was quick. Highly recommend staying with Charlotte and Hernan, they are full of useful information.

Please be aware this place does not look like the photos. It is very noisy and the place does not feel secure. To lock the bedroom window you use a rusty old screw!!!! The front door could easily be kicked in. There was a very bad odour throughout  the place and it smelt like sewerage. I have stayed in a few Airbnb places and never had a problem. I am wondering if some of the reviews are genuine. So please be warned about this place. I have stayed in better backpackers.
reviews.response:
Although we are not surprised about this review after meeting Cheryl and her husband, we feel so insulted about such malicious comments that we find it necessary to leave a public reply, although it is something we very rarely do.

In 2 years of all kind of experiences and with over 150 guests from all around the world, we never had such a bad experience with someone being so dishonest about their needs, their expectations and their comments.

As soon as they arrived in the apartment they asked if there was a TV, although is very clearly stated in the listing description that there is NOT one. Cheryl herself confessed that she has big trouble conciliating sleep and her husband also has trouble due to a severe spinal injury from his days in the army, which leaves us to wonder why they would choose to stay at a place located in one of the main avenues.

Cheryl starts by stating that the place does not look like in the pictures, and goes on to explain that the front door could be easily kicked in, and it smelt bad. Those do not seem to be thing that would be reflected in the pictures, which are actually a very real representation of what the apartment looks like, as we are not either professional photographers or would know how to "fake" the looks of it.

The bedroom window does not need to be locked with a screw, one pane has been locked like that so only the other one can be opened, and locked with it's regular lock. Also window faces our own backyard, which is fenced, so nobody form outside has the chance to get even near it.

She also mentions how the front door could be easily kicked in, without probably noticing that many doors in town are of the same style. We feel there might be some prejudice from the guests in thinking that as they are in South America they are in danger of being attacked at all times.

None of these things (or even the odor) were mentioned at all when they decided to leave or during the 45' conversation we had on their arrival were they asked many questions and were offered all the information and help they needed.

Finally in the most malicious and ludicrous attitude, Cheryl goes on to doubt if the more than 150 reviews that we got over 2 years of hosting, with such high ratings that made us Superhosts and kept us at that status for all this time are real. It's a highly insulting attitude coming from someone with 3 (three) reviews other than ours.

We HIGHLY encourage any other hosts in the Airbnb community to avoid receiving the Delaney's as they do not embody the spirit of Airbnb (Real homes rented by real people) we feel they do the vast majority of this community and travelers a great injustice, with their prejudice and dishonesty.

reviews.comments: We loved Charlotte and Hernán's place!  The apartment was charming and clean and had everything we needed.  Being able to use the washer and hang our clothes to dry was really helpful after just coming off the W trek in Torres del Paine!  They were sure to explain everything to us at check-in, like how to work the washer.  The apartment was just about 7 minutes walk from the bus station and about the same into the center of town.  There was a good grocery store 2-3 blocks away.  Charlotte and Hernán were very responsive to communication, including when our bus showed up an hour early and they let us check in with only 15 minutes' notice!  They went the extra mile and let us check in an hour early the first day and then held our bags the last day while we did the Minitrekking tour at Perito Moreno Glacier.  I definitely recommend this place if you are going to El Calafate!

Charlotte and Hernan made us extremely welcome and were so helpful in many respects, both before and during our stays (we were there at three different times during our holiday).  The place is very well located and close to all you need - bus station, shops and restaurants, supermarket - and I would definitely recommend it
Great location. Hernan is very service minded. Recommended!

Fantastic.  As described.  Everything you need.  Walkable to all tours.  Note "nau BnB" when booking tours and shuttles and you will get picked up and dropped off at the doorstep of of the AirBnB.  Wonderful attentive hosts.  Apartment was comfortable and perfect for a stay in El Calafate.  highly recommend.
Terrific location, clean , and comfortable.  Hosts were very friendly and provided great information on groceries and restaurants.

5 stars experience at budget cost. Charlotte and Hernan are excellent hosts and we're always on hand to help...They really set the standard for other Airbnb hosts. The accommodation is alsobexcellent with everything you could need for a pleasant stay. The town and all bars etc are in walking distance and it's location is also a ten minute walk from a nature reserve where you can spot flamingos.

Fantastic place. Well equipped for cooking if you want. Hosts were amazing. We ended up in three different places in the same price range in El Calafate and this was far and away the best. Highly recommended.

Os anfitriões são fantásticos!
A residência muitíssimo bem localizada, limpa, banho quente espetacular, com todos os utensílios operativos e aparelhos funcionando.
Foi uma experiência FANTÁSTICA!

Charlotte, Hernán and their place were excellent during a great stay in El Calafate! Far in advance of the trip, they were always friendly and accessible. They responded quickly to the couple of questions we had. The place is even better than described with all the things you need.  Hernán welcomed us and showed us the place.  He had great recommendations on rental car places, and taxis are right next door to provide a ride back to the airport. Location is great! Thanks so much for the hospitality. Highly recommended.

We were in El Calafate to head to Torres deal Paine. This home was lovely. Perfect. We walked to and from the bus station with our suitcases. The home was next to restaurants so we could walk everywhere for a meal. Very private and cosy. Perfect for a family with a child as it slept three. I would highly recommend it to anyone who wanted a comfy, cosy , budget home. There was a full kitchen that you could cook in if you chose.
Fantastic place to stay in El Calafate! Wish we could have stayed there longer. Charlotte and Hernan were very helpful and accommodating!
So satisfied his house

Charlotte and Herman provided a very clean and tidy apartment . We stayed there for 2 nights and the apartment has everything we needed. Herman and Charlotte are very responsive and helpful as host. We highly recommended their place to the travelers !
The apartment is super adorable and has everything you need to spend time in calafate.
Ótima localização, muito próximo ao coração da cidade. Espaço muito agradável.

We enjoyed our stay at Charlotte and Hernan's place: it's a short walk to restaurants, shopping, and the bus station, and is spacious and well decorated.  Charlotte and Hernan were very easy to communicate with prior to our arrival and very helpful and full of information throughout.  We recommend staying with them!
Excellent place and host, highly recommended.

Great location, only 10 min to bus station and 5 min to banks and restaurants. Place has everything  you need if you want to cook. Owners were right next door and quick to respond to any questions. And laundry was a huge plus! 

Only wished it had a couch or futon in the living area for hanging out.  Otherwise we enjoyed our stay.
Amáveis e muito nos ajudou em orientar-nos aos nossos passeios e atividades. Parabéns!
Charlotte and Hernan were so helpful and flexible with our changing travel plans. The kitchen was great and the house is an easy walk away from the bus station!

Very pleased with my stay. Great location-- close to the main street with shops and restaurant. Right next door to a taxi place, which was convenient. Very spacious and clean. Prompt communication. Would definitely recommend to others. 

Thanks again, Charlotte and Hernan!

The hosts were always responsive, very welcoming and spent a lot of time with us when we arrived to answer all of our questions and provide recommendations. The place is close to downtown, clean and lovely. I highly recommend!
Charlotte and Hernán were very helpful and responsive. Their place was easy to find, secure and conveniently located. I'd definitely recommend it!

This place is amazing. Near the bus station, and next door to a taxi station made this a very great location. A block off the Main Street made for easy exploring. The room is well equipped for cooking, and even has a washing machine for laundry! Hernán was an amazing host. He remembered that we were coming into town from El Chaltén and asked how our visit was. I had erroneously told Charlotte and Hernán that I would be arriving and hour later than my actual arrival time and was quite embarrassed about the mix up. Hernán was quick to arrive and let us in. I wish I could have stayed longer. This should be a standard for AirB&Bs. Just amazing.
